00017 //! \addtogroup fn_max
00018 //! @{
00019 
00020 
00021 //! \brief
00022 //! Delayed 'maximum values' operation.
00023 //! The dimension, along which the maxima are found, is set via 'dim'.
00024 //! For dim = 0, the maximum value of each column is found.
00025 //! For dim = 1, the maximum value of each row is found.
00026 //! The default is dim = 0.
00027 //! NOTE: This function works differently than in Matlab/Octave.
00028 
00029 template<typename T1>
00030 arma_inline
00031 const Op<T1, op_max>
00032 max(const Base<typename T1::elem_type,T1>& X, const u32 dim = 0)
00033   {
00034   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00035 
00036   return Op<T1, op_max>(X.get_ref(), dim, 0);
00037   }
00038 
00039 
00040 //! Immediate 'find the maximum value in a row vector' operation
00041 template<typename eT>
00042 inline
00043 eT
00044 max(const Row<eT>& A)
00045   {
00046   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00047   
00048   arma_debug_check( (A.n_elem == 0), "max(): given vector has no elements" );
00049   
00050   return op_max::direct_max(A.mem, A.n_elem);
00051   }
00052 
00053 
00054 
00055 //! Immediate 'find the maximum value in a column vector' operation
00056 template<typename eT>
00057 inline
00058 eT
00059 max(const Col<eT>& A)
00060   {
00061   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00062   
00063   arma_debug_check( (A.n_elem == 0), "max(): given vector has no elements" );
00064   
00065   return op_max::direct_max(A.mem, A.n_elem);
00066   }
00067 
00068 
00069 
00070 //! \brief
00071 //! Immediate 'find maximum value' operation,
00072 //! invoked, for example, by: max(max(A))
00073 template<typename T1>
00074 inline
00075 typename T1::elem_type
00076 max(const Op<T1, op_max>& in)
00077   {
00078   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00079   arma_extra_debug_print("max(): two consecutive max() calls detected");
00080   
00081   typedef typename T1::elem_type eT;
00082   
00083   const unwrap<T1> tmp1(in.m);
00084   const Mat<eT>& X = tmp1.M;
00085   
00086   arma_debug_check( (X.n_elem == 0), "max(): given matrix has no elements" );
00087   
00088   return op_max::direct_max(X.mem, X.n_elem);
00089   }
00090 
00091 
00092 
00093 template<typename T1>
00094 arma_inline
00095 const Op< Op<T1, op_max>, op_max>
00096 max(const Op<T1, op_max>& in, const u32 dim)
00097   {
00098   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00099   
00100   return Op< Op<T1, op_max>, op_max>(in, dim, 0);
00101   }

00107 eT
00108 max(const subview_row<eT>& A)

00110   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00111   
00112   arma_debug_check( (A.n_elem == 0), "max(): given vector has no elements" );
00113   
00114   return op_max::direct_max(A);
00115   }

00132 
00133 template<typename eT>
00134 inline
00135 eT
00136 max(const Op<subview<eT>, op_max>& in)
00137   {
00138   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00139   arma_extra_debug_print("max(): two consecutive max() calls detected");
00140   
00141   const subview<eT>& X = in.m;
00142   
00143   arma_debug_check( (X.n_elem == 0), "max(): given matrix has no elements" );
00144   
00145   return op_max::direct_max(X);
00146   }
